column4: Folks: am tryin to install ubuntu in Acer laptop and have this problem: When it tries to detect and mount CD-ROM, it says No common CDROM was detected
it's not a CD problem / it's not drive prob - was able to install Debian
some fora talked about some conflict with SATA and advised change in BIOS and afaik have IDE and BIOS dosen't lemme chg
what version of ubuntu?  I know warty wouldn't install on my external - nor would any of the livecds work
